Ok I'm done. ❤️ #alllifematters everyone needs someone's help. I'm not perfect and have done my fair share of wrongs. And that's why I speak for the weak I'm here to show any race that you are strong and beautiful. Struggle is growth, PAIN is growth. I stand for the black male stereotype and hold it proudly. Becuz I'm able to connect with the people society doesn't give a fuck about. I may have money, cars, fame. I love nice things but I also know they aren't important. Wouldn't you wanna say I lived my life to the fullest and enjoyed it. We have the make the choice as a society to want more. What is the purpose on this planet? We live we die. We are too busy focusing on the day to day "plan" to be workers or slaves. The goal is to reach a new level of consciousness All the WARs and slaughtering of innocent lives only breed more hate. From all governments. Even ours. Everyone has a task no matter how big nor small. And everyone can really make a difference People live on the surface. They believe what they want so the won't have to be afraid. AND THE GREATEST GIFT GOD HAS GIVEN US IS THE GIFT OF FREE WILL. There is a choice. From the moment we were born we have been learning. You have to have the negatives so u appreciate the lessons they teach you. It's the balance. People are afraid to be who they truly are because they limit themselves to other people's standards. We are born and taught how to behave, think and it limits us. Society is controlled by fear. Can everyone see how the world is falling apart? Everyone so separate and afraid. The world brands us and labels shit to associate it with That is what makes you YOU. Faith and hope are sometimes misused by greed and envy. LOVE is the goal! As people we are supposed to experience all these emotions so we learn from them. It's ok to be afraid. It's ok to be who you are. When you are angry, judgmental, racist, depressed, and you make a choice based on that, it's usually becuz of fear.
